content:
It was my pleasure to help! I'm thrilled to have been a part of your journey towards incorporating more flexibility-boosting foods and nutrients into your diet. Remember to have fun and be gentle with yourself as you explore new recipes and cooking techniques.

I'm excited to hear that you're attending a yoga workshop at a new studio downtown today! Remember to listen to your body, breathe deeply, and focus on your balance and flexibility. It's great that you're prioritizing your physical and mental well-being.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. I'll be here to help. Otherwise, enjoy your yoga practice, and I hope you have a wonderful time cooking and savoring your delicious Baked Salmon with Turmeric and Ginger tonight!

Namaste, and happy cooking!
